rf.mars

Class MarsIDF

  • java.lang.Object
    • rf.mars.MarsIDF
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RelevanceFeedback

    public class MarsIDF
extends java.lang.Object
implements RelevanceFeedback
    Provides the functionality of the rocchio query shifting approach.
    Author:
    Chris Wendler

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private double weightNegatives
      These are the weights of the rocchio equation, some values that worked well are: 1, 0.75, 0.15
      private double weightPositives
      These are the weights of the rocchio equation, some values that worked well are: 1, 0.75, 0.15
      private double weightQuery
      These are the weights of the rocchio equation, some values that worked well are: 1, 0.75, 0.15

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MarsIDF()
      When you not initiate the weights the default values 1, 0.76, 0.15 are used.
      MarsIDF(double a, double b, double c)
      The constructor needs the weights for the rocchio equation.

    • Method Summary

      Methods

    • Field Detail

        These are the weights of the rocchio equation, some values that worked well are: 1, 0.75, 0.15

    • Constructor Detail

      • MarsIDF

        public MarsIDF()
        When you not initiate the weights the default values 1, 0.76, 0.15 are used.

      • MarsIDF

        public MarsIDF(double a,
       double b,
       double c)
        The constructor needs the weights for the rocchio equation.
        Parameters:
        a - is the weight that is applied to the old query vector (e.g. 1.0).
        b - is the weight that is applied to the mean of the positively marked images (e.g. 0.75).
        c - is the weight that is applied to the mean of the negatively marked images (e.g. 0.15).

    • Method Detail

      • learnQueryVector

        public ImageContainer learnQueryVector(ImageContainer query,
                              java.util.List<ImageContainer> positives,
                              java.util.List<ImageContainer> negatives,
                              DescriptorType type)
        implements the query vector translation from the mars paper (rocchio algorithm)
        Parameters:
        query - the query image
        positives - the list of results which was marked positive
        negatives - all results that were not marked
        type - the type of the descriptor which was used for search
        Returns:
        the image containing the moved query vector

      • relevanceFeedbackIteration

        public java.util.List<ImageContainer> relevanceFeedbackIteration(Retriever retriever,
                                                        ImageContainer query,
                                                        DescriptorType type,
                                                        Metric metric,
                                                        java.util.List<ImageContainer> positives,
                                                        java.util.List<ImageContainer> negatives,
                                                        int resultAmount)
        Performs a relevance feedback iteration. Side effect: all the RF Methods add the positively and negatively marked images to the query Image object.
        Specified by:
        relevanceFeedbackIteration in interface RelevanceFeedback
        Parameters:
        retriever - the retriever which is used to search.
        query - the query image.
        type - the descriptortype which was used for the query.
        positives - the images marked as positive.
        negatives - the images marked as negative.
        resultAmount - the number of desired results.
        Returns:
        the results after considering the user feedback.
